dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's Parliament is pushing for a major expansion of the HPV vaccine program to include boys.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's Parliament is pushing for a major expansion of the H P V vaccine program to include boys.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Members of Kazakhstan's Parliament have voiced their support for introducing voluntary HPV vaccination for boys, highlighting the need to expand the country's current immunization program beyond girls.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, MP Askhat Aimagambetov, um, he's been really vocal about this, saying parents are actually asking for it for their sons.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, M P Askhat Aimagambetov, um, he's been really vocal about this, saying parents are actually asking for it for their sons.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: MP Askhat Aimagambetov stated that many Kazakh parents have themselves requested access to the human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine for boys.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and right now only girls aged 11 get it for free, which started last September.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and right now only girls aged eleven get it for free, which started last September.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While girls aged 11 have been eligible for free HPV vaccination since last September, the current initiative aims to offer the same opportunity to boys on a voluntary basis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But he makes a good point—HPV isn't just a women's issue. It causes throat, mouth, even rectal cancers in men too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he makes a good point-H P V isn't just a women's issue. It causes throat, mouth, even rectal cancers in men too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: HPV causes not only cervical cancer but also cancers of the throat, mouth, rectum and genitals - including in men.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And that's why so many countries already vaccinate both genders. It just makes public health sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that's why so many countries already vaccinate both genders. It just makes public health sense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Many countries already vaccinate boys alongside girls.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He also mentioned on Telegram that the vaccine is hard to get through pharmacies, which is a big access issue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He also mentioned on Telegram that the vaccine is hard to get through pharmacies, which is a big access issue.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He added that the vaccine is difficult to obtain through pharmacies and called on the Ministry of Healthcare to ensure broader public access.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so he's calling on the Health Ministry to step in and make it more available.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so he's calling on the Health Ministry to step in and make it more available.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He added that the vaccine is difficult to obtain through pharmacies and called on the Ministry of Healthcare to ensure broader public access.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it sounds like they're listening—Minister Alnazarova said they're considering expanding eligibility to boys and even adults over 18.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it sounds like they're listening-Minister Alnazarova said they're considering expanding eligibility to boys and even adults over eighteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Health Minister Akmaral Alnazarova recently confirmed that the ministry is considering expanding the eligibility criteria for HPV vaccination to include boys and adults aged 18 and older, with all shots administered on a voluntary basis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: All on a voluntary basis, though, which, you know, keeps choice in parents' hands.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: All on a voluntary basis, though, which, you know, keeps choice in parents' hands.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Health Minister Akmaral Alnazarova recently confirmed that the ministry is considering expanding the eligibility criteria for HPV vaccination to include boys and adults aged 18 and older, with all shots administered on a voluntary basis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But given the stats show cervical cancer is the second most common cancer for women in Kazakhstan, with 1,900 new cases a year...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But given the stats show cervical cancer is the second most common cancer for women in Kazakhstan, with nineteen hundred new cases a year...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Health Ministry, cervical cancer is the second most common cancer among women of all ages in Kazakhstan and the second leading cause of cancer-related deaths among women aged 25-44, with around 1,900 new cases reported annually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: ...it really underscores how crucial prevention is across the board. This could save lives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...it really underscores how crucial prevention is across the board. This could save lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. HPV is so common, and while most strains are harmless, the high-risk ones are no joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. H P V is so common, and while most strains are harmless, the high-risk ones are no joke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While most types are harmless, some high-risk strains are known to cause various forms of cancer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's about equity and smart public policy—protecting everyone who's vulnerable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about equity and smart public policy-protecting everyone who's vulnerable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Hopefully this gets approved soon. It's a step forward for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hopefully this gets approved soon. It's a step forward for sure.
